property.value: Distributing supplies in an Afghan classroom

note.text: Whether you are training Afghans or implementing a project on the ground, it’s important to learn about the local perspective. What’s important to Afghans may not be immediately obvious to Americans and some well-intentioned projects may be seen as threatening.
It can be helpful to bring in a local Afghan to assess your plans before beginning a project. Always include your Afghan counterparts in the decision-making process and take their input seriously.
